t: Amazon Reclaims Title As USA's Most Valuable Brand, Despite Losing Brand Value
s: March 29, 2023 - Amazon.com, Inc. (NASDAQ:AMZN) has retaken top spot as the USA’s most valuable brand despite its brand value falling 15%% this year from US$350.3 billion to US$299.3 billion.
